venue.name: Sorenson Theater @ Sorenson Center of Art

item.description:
Hello all, happy Spring-
Here's a free event at Babson College in Wellesley. In case you want to go!
Best,
R

"My name is Shin-Yi Yang, the director of the Boston Guzheng
Ensemble. We will have a concert coming on April 11 at Babson
College and I have the press release. Can you please help me to
post it on your website?

“The Boston Guzheng Ensemble will have their annual concert on
Saturday, April 11, 7:30 p.m. at Sorenson Theater, Sorenson
Center of Art, Babson College, 231 Forest St., Wellesley, MA
02457.

Invented originally from China, the Guzheng is a plucked
instrument that has 2,500 years of history. Today, it becomes
one of the most popular Chinese instruments in China and the
United States. In the concert, the ensemble will perform
traditional, folk, and modern music from China.

The BGE was founded by Shin-Yi Yang, the director of the
ensemble, in 2002. The mission of the ensemble is to promote
Chinese culture and music to the public and to bring to the
audience a new sound and aural experience that are slightly
different from the more typical individual performances.

For more information visit www.BostonGuzheng.org. Admission is
free.”

Please let me know if there have any questions.

Thank you,
Shin-Yi"
item.how_to_find_us: Not a Meetup- go on our own, bring your friends

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: GuZheng Concert-free-in Wellesley Sat 4/11 7:30p fyi
